sourcesContent:
<form class="contact-form" (submit)="sendEmail($event)">
    <label>Name</label>
    <input type="text" name="user_name">
    <label>Email</label>
    <input type="email" name="user_email">
    <label>Message</label>
    <textarea name="message"></textarea>
    <input type="submit" value="Send">
  </form>
